alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Magoffin; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, southeastern Menifee, northwestern Breathitt, west central Magoffin and Wolfe Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 308 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Calaboose, or near Campton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stillwater, Vortex and Murphyfork around 315 PM EDT. Trent, Baptist, Hazel Green, Mary and Flat around 320 PM EDT. Landsaw and Rexville around 325 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Malaga, Hollonville, Daysboro, Lane, Bethany, Lexie, Gilmore, Lower Gilmore, Sellars, Pence, Upper Gilmore, Paxton, Helechawa, Simpson, Rosefork, Shockey, Moct, Lee City, Rock Lick, Belknap, Taulbee, Burkhart and Sewell. THIS INCLUDES Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 40 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
